snippet: Bartlett Sher will stage a revival of Clifford Odets's 1937 drama "Golden Boy" on Broadway, and Mr. Durang's new play, "Vanya and Sonia and Masha and Spike," is scheduled to begin previews at the Mitzi E. Newhouse Theater on Oct. 25.
abstract: Bartlett Sher will stage a revival of Clifford Odets's 1937 drama "Golden Boy" on Broadway, and Mr. Durang's new play, "Vanya and Sonia and Masha and Spike," is scheduled to begin previews at the Mitzi E. Newhouse Theater on Oct. 25.

headline.main: Lincoln Center Theater to Stage Odets Revival and New Durang Play
